Here are 5 creative and crazy challenges that you could try while on a solo trip to Japan to work on social anxiety:

1.   You could challenge yourself to go to a Japanese izakaya (pub) every day and socialize with strangers and make new friends.
2.   You could challenge yourself to go to a Japanese karaoke bar every day and sing a song in front of a crowd.
3.   You could challenge yourself to go to a Japanese maid cafe every day and interact with the waitresses as if they were your friends.
4.   You could challenge yourself to go to a Japanese arcade every day and play games with other people and try to make new friends playing the games.
5.   You could challenge yourself to go to a Japanese night market every day and interact with the vendors and other shoppers and try to make new friends.

It's important to note that these challenges are not just about overcoming social anxiety, but also about breaking out of your comfort zone and expanding your social circle. Additionally, it's important to be respectful and considerate of others while attempting these challenges.
